flawed_nl_solution:
It took 8*0.25=<<8*0.25=2>>2 years longer to go from chief to master chief than to get chief
So it takes him 8+2=<<8+2=10>>10 years to become a master chief
That means he took 10+8=<<10+8=81>>81 years to reach master chief from enlisting
So he was in the military for 81+10=<<81+10=91>>91 years
So he was 91+18=<<91+18=109>>109 when he retired
#### 109

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
